New Records: England became the first team to hold both white-ball World Cups
Sam Curran was the only bowler with a five-wicket haul in the World Cup
Key Match Events: Ben Stokes hit the winning runs of the T20 World Cup
Moeen Ali was run out by Wasim
Haris Rauf finished his quota and England took control
Pre-Game Insights: Experts predicted a close match between England and Pakistan
England's brand of attacking cricket was expected to be a key factor in their success
Post-Match Reflections: Moeen Ali called it the best day of his life
Ben Stokes was praised for his redemption arc and ability to perform under pressure
Miscellaneous Highlights: England's turnaround in ICC men's white-ball events was highlighted as an achievement to be proud of
Pakistan were heroic with the ball but unlucky with the bat
Others: The match was played at the MCG
Ben Stokes had a redemption arc after being involved in a controversy in 2016
